name: Black Hills Corporation
description: Black Hills Corporation is a diversified energy company that provides essential utility and energy services to customers across the United States. Founded in 1941, the company is headquartered in Rapid City, South Dakota. Black Hills Corporation operates in two primary segments: Utility and Non-Utility. The Utility segment provides electric and natural gas services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers in several states, including South Dakota, Wyoming, Nebraska, Colorado, and Montana. The Non-Utility segment focuses on the production and marketing of natural gas and oil, as well as providing energy solutions to various industries. Black Hills is committed to sustainable practices and has made significant investments in renewable energy sources, aiming to reduce its carbon footprint and enhance energy efficiency. The company is also focused on infrastructure improvements and expanding its renewable portfolio to meet the growing demand for cleaner energy. Through its robust operational strategies and commitment to service excellence, Black Hills Corporation aims to deliver reliable and affordable energy while contributing positively to the communities it serves.
